title: A Sketchy Job
overview: Lu Xiao, a university student, applies for an unconventional job to make ends meet: a fake boyfriend service. In this job where he will work as a "boyfriend-for-hire", all he has to do is play certain roles in front of his clients and maintain this relationship without forming any emotional attachment. Everything goes according to his rules... until he meets his new client, Liu Zai Rong.
